Title: Relates to enacting the biomass fired exception program
Summary: Relates to enacting the biomass fired exception program providing an exception for certain biomass fired electric generation facilities to the definition of a fossil fuel-fired facility for purposes of a CO2 budget trading program.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to enacting the "biomass fired exception program" addressing the applicability of a CO2 budget trading program to biomass-fired electric generating facilities that have converted from coal-fired generation
